body.p: Congratulations on your purchase of the ContentGrasp SX headset. This revolutionary device will significantly improve the quality of your technical documentation without implementing an additional work step. During the normal review, the reviewers or test persons can check

ul.li: how carefully individual passages were read;
which passages needed to be read repeatedly.

body.p: This information is recorded by the headset and analyzed by intelligent software using a sophisticated algorithm.
The result enables detailed, systematic improvement of the comprehensibility of technical documentation at an unprecedented level.

section.title: Radio Interference
section.p: Strong static, electric or high-frequency fields (radio systems, mobile phones, microwave ovens) can impair the function of the device and distort the results. Try to stay as far as possible from interfering appliances.

section.title: Headache
section.p: In extremely rare cases, prolonged use of the ContentGrasp SX headset can cause headache and increased irritability. Avoid sessions of more than four hours, and regularly take breaks.

section.title: Skin Irritation
section.p: Skin irritation can occur at the contact points during prolonged use. Use the supplied contact gel to protect your skin.

body.p: The ContentGrasp SX headset comprises the following components:

ul.li: Compathy ContentGrasp SX cable remote control
One bottle of ContentGrasp SX contact gel
Intel Core 2 Duo 2.2 GHz or similar AMD CPU

body.p: Put the ContentGrasp SX headset on like normal earphones. Slightly pull the two sides of the headband to adjust the headset to the size of your head.
Make sure that the two ear pads comfortably encompass your ears. This ensures that the sensors on the headband are positioned correctly, and your brain waves can be analyzed effectively.

Subsequently, open the caps on the right and left ear pad and extract the temple sensors as far as they will go. Firmly press the sensors to your temples and pull the attached handles. Optionally, you can apply some contact gel to your temples.
To avoid impairment of the sensor performance, keep your hair out of the way between your temples and the sensors.
To activate the headset, press the On/Off button on the cable remote control. You can also activate the headset via the ContentGrasp SX icon in the systray of your computer.
Open the document to be evaluated. Confirm the dialog that opens up automatically by clicking "Start". Thus, the recording will begin, and you should start reading the document.
You can always interrupt the recording with the cable remote control, which however will also minimize the document.
